attributes.title: Stay away from this app
attributes.review: This app ave my phone 6 different Viruses and start deleting apps on my phone if there was a rating below 1 Star I would give that app that rating

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: Horrible, racist, very hard to use. Took 30 minutes to load. Cannot possibly recommend

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Took forever to download. Full of ads and spam!! It downloaded a bunch of other apps on my phone and I’m pretty sure it gave me a virus. 0 stars just terrible.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is honestly so slow and I wish I had never got it. It’s a complete waste of space in my phone and I’m most definitely deleting it

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Since I downloaded this app my iPhone has been automatically powering off and lots of my important files have been corrupted.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Oh my....... this app doesn’t even deserve ONE star! It took half a year to download and once I opened it, it kept glitching, kicking me out of the app and shutting off my phone......I hate it here.

attributes.title: Eww
attributes.review: I got this app to see if it could change my perspective on the trump but all it made me want to do is eat the out side of a water Mellon and put a toothpick under my toe nail then kick the wall as hard as I can

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to show my support for the obese cheeto puff but when i downloaded the app my dead grandmother buried in my back yard rose and said trump 2020 , worst experience in my life would not recommend

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: y’all this app was absolutely terrible. i can not believe that they would put something like this out there. spammed my phone and legit would not download for days. ridiculous

attributes.title: Worst app in the history of everything
attributes.review: This app gave my phone viruses and tried to deport me and make me not only build but pay for a wall so I can’t come back. Sad
